channel.title: Object Oriented on jverkamp.com
channel.description: Recent content in Object Oriented on jverkamp.com

item.title: A prototype object system for Racket
item.description: As I seem to be wont to do, I needed something to work on my Roguelike in Racket tutorial series–so I wrote it! This time, we’re looking to add a prototyped-based object system to Racket. I’m sure that someone has rigged up something similar before, but it’s often more interesting to work things like this out for oneself.
